english.segment1: It all starts here with my disgrace. I give you my life then I run in haste. In this false life something needs to give
english.segment2: Tell me a reason why this isn't treason. Tell me, tell me I'm wrong. I swear I'm back but then it turns out it's only a season. So tell me, tell me I'm wrong
english.segment3: With my two lips I will praise your name. Then I turn around and only curse and blame. I give in, strength is thin, adding to my shame
